properties.description: Form Identifier for Callbacks
properties.title: FormName

properties.description: What kind of submission is this?
properties.title: Submission Type

properties.description:
The title of the publication, verbatim.

Note: if you're filling out a subtitle, please include the colon in this title field.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Subtitle of the publication.
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description: If the title has a typo or other particular issue, please enter the original title in the Title field and the corrected title in this field.
properties.title: Alternative Title

properties.description: Abstract or summary of the item.
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: Copyright information related to the publication; could be information from the journal or publisher about ownership of the content and/or terms for sharing this material in an Institutional Repository. Could also be a Creative Commons license declaration. If unsure, feel free to skip.
properties.title: Copyright Information

properties.description: URL for the publisher's version of the article, if there is one.
properties.title: URL

properties.description: Digital object identifier of the item.
properties.title: DOI

properties.description: A URI for the item, potentially an HTTP URL.
properties.title: URI

properties.description: The PubMed Central Identifier for the item.
properties.title: PMCID

properties.description: OCLC Number for the submitted item.
properties.title: OCLC

properties.description: Authors of the item; Full author names are entered when they appear in the author position of an article, usually on the title page of an article.
properties.title: Authors

properties.description: This field is unique to UNB Scholar and needs to be added by a librarian or the repository manager. It is used to link to Faculty Profiles. You may skip it and it will be filled in later.
properties.title: Qualified Name

properties.description: A study group or name of a collaborative group that can be listed as an author; for example: New Brunswick Department of Natural Resources.
properties.title: Group Author

properties.description: Facet information is metadata used specifically by UNB Scholar to improve searching and collections building. Metadata in these fields may be used to narrow-down search results or help designate specific items to unique collections.
properties.title: Facet Information

properties.description: Please select which collection this submission is intended for.
properties.title: Collection

properties.description: Was the article published in a journal or publication?
properties.title: Article Is Published

properties.description: Information pertaining to either the book or journal which contains this resource.
properties.title: Publication Information

properties.description: Title of the journal, in full.
properties.title: Journal Title

properties.description: Publication year.
properties.title: Publication Date of Issue

properties.description: Volume the article is published in.
properties.title: Volume

properties.description: The issue of the volume the paper corresponds with.
properties.title: Issue

properties.description: URL for the Journal the article is in.
URL for publisher's page for the issue this article was in.
properties.title: URL

properties.description: The language(s) the item is published in.
properties.title: Language

properties.description: Notes, comments, corrections to the publication record; typically done by library staff or other administrators of the system
properties.title: Notes
